bioconda.name: fusioncatcher
bioconda.summary: Finder of Somatic Fusion Genes in RNA-seq data.

biocontainers.name: fusioncatcher
biocontainers.summary: Finder of Somatic Fusion Genes in RNA-seq data.

biotools.summary: FusionCatcher searches for novel/known somatic fusion genes, translocations, and chimeras in RNA-seq data (paired-end or single-end reads from Illumina NGS platforms like Solexa/HiSeq/NextSeq/MiSeq) from diseased samples).

bioschemas.name: FusionCatcher
bioschemas.summary: FusionCatcher searches for novel/known somatic fusion genes, translocations, and chimeras in RNA-seq data (paired-end or single-end reads from Illumina NGS platforms like Solexa/HiSeq/NextSeq/MiSeq) from diseased samples).
